etymology.description: 䰜(䰜) (lì, "cauldron") + 米(米) (mǐ, "rice") = cooking rice in cauldron with steam (弓) -> congee
etymology.interpretation: The character 鬻(yù, "congee") visually represents a cauldron (䰜) used for cooking rice (米), with two 弓 depicting steam, illustrating the process of making congee. Eventually, 鬻 was borrowed to mean 'to sell', while 粥 retained the original meaning related to congee.
